entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:58 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
